amendment.description: To enable military family members to take leave to attend to deployment-related business and tasks.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3400 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 3400 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To enable military family members to take leave to attend to deployment-related business and tasks.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3400 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Feingold.
